name: Glitch Garden (The Learn Journ)
description:
A fun little Plants vs Zombies clone made as part of Ben Tristem's Unity course. 

I've added a few more attackers and defenders. The difficulty slider changes how many lives you have; 20, 10, 5 or 1.

I hope you enjoy my game :)

You can also find out more about this game by following the link below:

http://thelearnjourn.com/glitch-garden/
